title: Ownership Structure of Mesa Air Group Inc

content.text: As of the latest available data, institutional investors hold approximately 62.3% of Mesa Air Group Inc's stock. This indicates strong interest from large investment firms and mutual funds in the company.

The major shareholders of Mesa Air Group Inc are as follows:

1. Seligman Investments - Holds 13.4% of the company's stock
2. BlackRock Inc. - Holds 10.8% of the company's stock
3. The Vanguard Group, Inc. - Holds 9.1% of the company's stock
4. Hub Group, Inc. - Holds 8.2% of the company's stock
5. Dimensional Fund Advisors LP - Holds 5.7% of the company's stock

Insider ownership in Mesa Air Group Inc is relatively low, with insiders holding around 1.6% of the company's stock. This suggests that company executives and board members do not have a significant stake in the company.

news.headline: XTI Aerospace Announces Mesa Airlines' Investment in XTI and Conditional Pre-Order for 100 TriFan 600 Aircraft
news.summary: XTI Aerospace, Inc. (Nasdaq: XTIA) ("XTI Aerospace" or the "Company") today announced that Mesa Air Group, Inc. ("Mesa") (Nasdaq: MESA) ("Mesa"), the holding company of regional air carrier Mesa Airlines, is the purchaser under a previously disclosed conditional purchase order with XTI Aircraft Company ("XTI"), a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Company, for up to 100 TriFan 600 aircraft, a fixed-wing, vertical lift crossover airplane (VLCA), which is currently in development. If all conditions ar

news.headline: Mesa Provides Additional Detail on Holdings in XTI Aerospace
news.summary: PHOENIX, June 05, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mesa Air Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: MESA) (“Mesa” or the “Company”) today provided additional detail around its holdings in XTI Aerospace, Inc. (“XTI Aerospace”), which is developing the TriFan 600, a unique, fixed-wing vertical lift crossover airplane (VLCA) that can take off and land like a helicopter and is configurable to transport up to six passengers. news.headline: Mesa Regains Compliance with NASDAQ Minimum Bid Price Requirement
news.summary: PHOENIX, June 05, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mesa Air Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: MESA) (“Mesa” or the “Company”) today announced that it has received a notification letter from the Listing Qualifications Department of the Nasdaq Stock Market LLC (“NASDAQ”) informing the Company that it has regained compliance with the minimum bid price requirement set forth in Nasdaq Listing Rule 5550(a)(2) (the “Minimum Bid Price Requirement”). news.headline: DHL Express ends capacity agreement with Mesa Airlines
news.summary: Mesa Airlines has stopped flying for DHL Express, citing low cargo demand. The post DHL Express ends capacity agreement with Mesa Airlines appeared first on FreightWaves.
